mapper.update: update user set email=#{email}, wechat=#{wechat} , userimgpath=#{userimgpath} ,password=#{password} ,intro=#{intro},question=#{question},answer=#{answer} where userid=#{userid}
mapper.select: select doc.docid as docid,doc.title as title,recentread.readtime as readtime from doc,recentread where recentread.docid=doc.docid and recentread.userid=#{userid} and doc.status=0 order by readtime desc
select doc.docid as docid,doc.title as title from doc,collection where doc.docid=collection.docid and collection.userid=#{userid} and doc.status=0 order by doc.modifytime desc
select doc.docid as docid,doc.title as title,doc.modifytime as modifytime from doc where doc.userid=#{userid} and doc.status=0 order by doc.modifytime desc
select doc.docid as docid,doc.title as title,doc.deletetime as deletetime from doc where doc.userid=#{userid} and doc.status=1 order by doc.deletetime desc
select teamid,teamname from team where leaderid=#{userid}
select team.teamid as teamid,team.teamname as teamname from team,teammember where team.teamid=teammember.teamid and teammember.userid=#{userid} and teammember.teamperms>0

select doc.docid as docid,doc.title as title,doc.modifytime as modifytime from doc where doc.userid=#{userid} and doc.docid in ( select perms.docid from perms group by perms.docid having count(*)>=2 ) order by modifytime desc
select doc.docid as docid,doc.title as title,doc.modifytime as modifytime from doc,perms where perms.userid=#{userid} and doc.docid=perms.docid and doc.userid != #{userid} order by modifytime desc
